amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $4.2 million appropriation for the President's Council of Economic Advisers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-208 to strike funding for the President's Council of Economic Advisers ($4.2 million).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 279 (Roll no. 555).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Price (GA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 279 (Roll no. 555).
